/* Dialects and descendants */ re-ordered dialects in order from most-spoken to least-spoken
read [[WP:BRD]]. If your edit is contested, then you must build a consensus for it on the Talk page BEFORE reinserting it here
The mast that can probably de done is copy-editing, but I think the change should be kept.
My edit which has been contested. My point is that grouping of Arabic within any larger division isn't consolidated so it's better to indicate the proposed nature and the closest established group.
linked Arabic alphabet , and included mention of abjad
minor edits that should likely not be challenged

While the Northwest Semitic group is well established, there are still uncertainties as to the grouping of Arabic (see [[Semitic languages#Classification]])
